# Tld

- `v::tld()`

Validates a top-level domain

```php
v::tld()->validate('com'); // true
v::tld()->validate('ly'); // true
v::tld()->validate('org'); // true
```

***
See also:

  * [CountryCode](CountryCode.md)
  * [Domain](Domain.md)
  * [Ip](Ip.md)
  * [MacAddress](MacAddress.md)
  * [SubdivisionCode](SubdivisionCode.md)
